title: The Child molester
creator_credit: Herbert J. Leder and HSF Safety and Training
brief_description: Emphasises the dangers of attack on children and dramatizes typical approaches. The film shows what can be done to reduce the problem by making children aware of molesters and the precautions to be taken when accosted by strangers.
